name: Will You Squid?
description:
Squid is just an AI trying to live its life when this violent snail comes along and tries to KILL SQUID'S MOTHER!

Squid must stop the snail!

Left click to place spikes- DON'T RUN OUT!

Game by Voidkettle

IntangibleMatter (Twitter @Intangible_Dev) and Inscrutable_salma (Insta @inscrutable_salma)
